game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the hidden temple and retrieve an ancient artifact.
game.description: A local tribe has lost their sacred treasure, a golden idol. They believe it's hidden within a long-abandoned temple deep in the jungle. Your mission is to find the temple and return the idol.

task.description: The temple is hidden behind a waterfall. Look for a narrow opening in the rocks.

task.objective: Navigate the temple's traps and puzzles
task.description: The temple is filled with deadly traps and ancient puzzles. Use your wits to overcome them.
The idol is located in a chamber filled with treasure. Be careful not to trigger any traps.
